Battle Specials
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Monster Farm 4 (Spoilers!): Reviews, Information on Gameplay, Etc. : Battle Specials
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, August 27, 2003 - 11:22 am:

Battle Specials are still in the game, and Grit (or whatever the translators will call it) is definitely back. I have been in tourneys several times now where I have KO's a monster and it came back with one life point. Overall, while the text goes by awfully fast, it appears that they seem to be a lot more like MR2 Battle Specials than the MR3 type. I haven't seen anything like 'stunned' or 'shrunken'.

By BlackRipper on Wednesday, August 27, 2003 - 12:41 pm:

i hope they have all of the specials
